##Overview
Here,we use Presidential dataset and plot the term of US Presidents using bargraph.We plot the top 8 presidents in decreasing order of the duration of term.


```{r , include= FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
```

##Plot-8 US presidents(with maximum Term)
yaxis="Presidential term (days)"
x-axis=Various US Presidents

```{r,echo=FALSE}

data("presidential")
d<-data.frame(presidential)
d$t<-d$end - d$start
d1<-d[order(-d$t),]

d1<-d1[1:8,]
d1$t1<-d1$t/365
p<-plot_ly(d1,y=d1$t1,color=d1$name,type="bar")
p
```
